meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unchanging.
meanings.sent1: The unchangingness of the mountain range is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the unchangingness of my favorite coffee shop.
meanings.sent3: The unchangingness of the weather forecast is starting to get boring.
meanings.sent4: Her unchangingness in her opinions is like a rock in a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The unchangingness of the old clock on the wall reminded him of his childhood home.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of remaining constant or consistent.
meanings.sent1: The unchangingness of the recipe ensures the dish always tastes the same.
meanings.sent2: His unchangingness in his routine is both comforting and predictable.
meanings.sent3: The unchangingness of the traffic light made him wonder if it was broken.
meanings.sent4: The unchangingness of her smile brightened up his day.
meanings.sent5: The unchangingness of the stars in the night sky is a source of wonder for many.
